articles.title: Francisco Guzmán
articles.contents:
Home
          
          
          About me
          Projects
          Random
          
          
          Lessons
           
          ▾
          
          
          My 1st R Markdown Lesson
          Math Lesson
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Francisco Guzmán
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                         GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                         Contact Me
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Bio
            Frank Hermosillo studies neural networks and their
            applications at Google Brain. His research focuses on
            differentiable network pruning approximation and
            decentralized gradient inversion mechanics. He frequently
            collaborates with researchers who study machine learning,
            computer vision, and cognitive science. His work has been
            featured in WIRED, The Atlantic, Newsweek, and The New York
            Times Magazine.
            
            
            Education
            University of Chile | Santiago,
            Chile
            Business Engineering, BSc. in Economics | 2016 - 2021
            
            
            Experience
            Servicio Nacional del Consumidor
            (SERNAC) | Intern in Management Control and Process
            Improvement Unit | July 2020 - February 2021 | Santiago,
            Chile
            Support in the review and validation of indicators,
            review and editing of Service documentation and permanent
            collaboration in the area of User Satisfaction, where we
            worked with Power BI.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Francisco Guzmán
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                       GitHub
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                       Contact Me

                         GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                         Contact Me
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Bio
            Welcome to my Blog! I’m Francisco, a data enthusiast
            embarking on my journey to secure my first professional
            experience as a data analyst. In this space, I’ll be sharing
            the skills I’ve honed as I navigate the fascinating realm of
            data analysis. Join me on this exciting journey, where we’ll
            not only delve into data and trends but also explore aspects
            of my life, passions such as traveling, and experiences that
            have shaped my path. I invite you to explore my page and get
            to know more about me and my interests. I hope you enjoy the
            adventure as much as I do! Let’s discover the potential of
            data and a bit more about my life together!
            
            
            Education
            University of Chile | Santiago,
            Chile
            Business Engineering, BSc. in Economics | 2016 - 2021
            
            
            Experience
            Servicio Nacional del Consumidor
            (SERNAC) | Intern in Management Control and Process
            Improvement Unit | July 2020 - February 2021 | Santiago,
            Chile
            Support in the review and validation of indicators,

            collaboration in the area of User Satisfaction, where we
            worked with Power BI.

articles.title: Untitled
articles.description: A new article created using the Distill format.
articles.contents:
Contents
Taster
Using R in the classroom
Setting up RStudio Cloud
Creating a new R Project (RStudio Cloud & Desktop)


Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill for R Markdown at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.
Taster
Check out 3 online, interactive lessons to see the cool things you can do with R (these lessons use the learnr package)
Draw boxplots
Generate sequences
Representing data with boxplots
Using R in the classroom
Setting up RStudio Cloud


Packages used in all the lessons: tidyverse, leaflet, ggeasy, astsa
Creating a new R Project (RStudio Cloud & Desktop)
